body.name: Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo with 7 Colored Backlits, Wrist Rest, Rechargeable Ergonomic Keyboard with Phone Holder, Silent Lighted Full Size Combo for Window, Mac, PC, Laptop-Trueque (Black)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 41 mins
features: 【Gorgeous Backlits Combo】The wireless backlit keyboard has 7 color options and 3-level adjustable brightness. The mouse has 15 switchable lighting effects. they can provide you with more ambiance and visual aesthetics typing experience. The clear light-up letters make it easier to find your keys in the dark. This wireless keyboard mouse can perfectly balance work and games will be your best choice！

【Ergonomic Design with Wrist Rest】This keyboard with wrist rest and ergonomic typing angle design provides support for your wrists and reduces twisting. An ergonomic keyboard and mouse combo is designed to fit the natural contours of the hand, reducing stress on the wrist and hand muscles. The ergonomic mouse with a contoured shape and soft rubber grip ensure all-day comfort.

【Rechargeable and Long-Lasting】The rechargeable keyboard and mouse are equipped with a type-c charging cable, standby time is up to 2000 hours. Has a friendly smart energy-saving feature that automatically turns off the backlight after 90 seconds of non-use, the wireless combo with a separate power switch and backlit switch to save power.

【Convenient Device Holder】The wireless keyboard comes with a device holder to hold your phone or tablet. You can work by using a laptop when placing a tablet, or watching videos while working. Keep your desk clean and tidy. Additionally, the durable ergonomic keyboard and mouse with an anti-sweat, non-slip,spill-resistant design gives you fluid, comfortable typing.

【Wireless Connection and Silent Typing】Plug & play, wireless keyboard mouse combo shares the same USB receiver , which is stored in the mouse. 2.4GHz wireless technology provide a stable and reliable connection up to 33ft without any latency. Light and responsive tactile keystrokes make typing soft, quiet and comfortable. The wireless mouse feels just as clicky but makes 95% less noise. Don't worry about disturbing others.

【Multi-Functions and High Efficiency 】This wireless keyboard mouse combo features number keypad, 12 function keys, and 6 shortcut Keys that allow you to browse the webpage and access the calculator with one click. 6 button mouse with 3 DPI (800/1200/1600) and forward/backward functions will help you navigate the web faster and easier than ever before.

【Warranty】 Have a free one-year replacement warranty. If you have any issues. please contact us first, Professional customer service is on call 24 hours daily to solve your problems. Please make your purchase with confidence.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Ergonomic Wrist Rest 2 Rechargeable Long Lasting 3 Convenient Device Holder 4 3 Brightness Level 5 Multi-Function Mouse

How many lighting modes does this backlit keyboard and mouse have? Can the letters light up? The backlit wireless keyboard has 7 switchable backlit modesand 3-level adjustable brightness. The letters and edge of the keys both can light up. Where is the USB receiver? keyboard and mouse share a receiver. USB receiver in the back of the mouse. How to turn on/off the LED lights and adjust the backlit lightings? You can turn on or off the backlit on the keyboard by pressing the Fn + Scroll Lock key at the same time. Press Fn+Scroll Lock to change the backlight colors, Fn+Up Arrow (or Fn+Down Arrow) to adjust the brightness. What functions do the shortcut keys on the Backlits Keyboard have? The keyboard shortcuts function as follows: Previous page; Next page; Refresh; Search; Stop loading; Calculator. And the mouse can quickly adjust DPI and turn pages. What will I receive? 1x Light Up Wireless Keyboard and mouse 1x 2.4G USB Nano Receiver (USB receiver in the back of the mouse) 1x USB C Charging Cable 1x User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, bright, ergonomic and power saving
reviews.reviewText: I'm impressed with this keyboard - it's the perfect size and has a great feel. The keys are super soft to the touch and barely make a sound, and the color scheme is perfect for gamers (though you can adjust brightness or turn them off for a more traditional office setup. There are quite a few colors available, but blue one is my favorite). The ergonomic mouse has handy forward and back buttons for easy browsing (takes some getting used to, but it's really convenient!). Plus, the built-in phone holder is a great feature, making it easy to view both my monitor and phone screen at once. Another great thing is that both mouse and keyboard are rechargeable (USB cable included), so finally I do not have to care about buying batteries every now and then! On top of it, they enter sleep mode within 15 or 30 min, and also have power-off switch - which makes single charge to last for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had bought a cheaper keyboard/mouse combo and the 2 AA batteries in the mouse went dead after 1 month. My hand always kept hitting the CTRL key when i was typing. This keyboard/mouse combo is rechargeable and will work will being charged! Mouse lasts for 30 hours and it turns off when not in use. The tapered keyboard keeps my palm from hitting the CRTL key all the time. and the backlit keyboard make typing easy. not to mention the different colors to choose from. I can also tell the keys are of higher quality when typing. I think it said i goa million stokes or better! This is quality for not that much money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars well I had to return the first one (update)
reviews.reviewText: Update is at the bottom. Item has been replaced and the new keyboard and mouse work great.As the title said. I am returning the first one that I received. Once the Keyboard times out after about 90 seconds, the battery light flashes slowly and I have to turn the keyboard off and leave it off for about 5 seconds and turn it back on and it will work for a while until I don't use it for the same 90 seconds or so. seems like there is a issue with sleep timer. I like the keyboard for the use and spacing of keys. The Mouse works fine with no issues. it’s too bad this doesn't work as it should as it could be a really decent product. maybe the next one will work fine. If it does work fine then I will update this, if not I will leave it the same.The new one is working as advertised. I am happy with the product. Customer support has been great. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I must say, I was skeptical that this would jump out of the box and connect itself to my computer, but that is exactly what it did! This was the fastest setup time I’ve ever experienced. I’m an Automotive Partsman at a dealership and the piece of trash equipment that I had did not work the way I wanted it to. This is why I took it upon myself to purchase my own equipment. It works so good that our Parts Manager ordered the same setup himself the next day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functional and Very Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I needed to upgrade my wireless mouse and keyboard. This option is absolutely wonderful, ergonomically comfortable, and cost-efficient. Thank you for fast shipping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Keyboard stops working
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this keyboard, mouse set for work as I work from home. When I received the product I fully charged both mouse and keyboard as the instructions say. The mouse works great but the keyboard backlight turns off after about 60 seconds of not using it and then it just completely stops working. The light starts flashing like it is dying even though it was just fully charged. After switching the power off and then back on it starts working again until the same thing happens. Ordered a replacement thinking the one I got was just defective but the second one I got had the exact same issue. Would not recommend unless you want to overpay for a mouse and get a useless keyboard with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Delays in typing
reviews.reviewText: There are occasional delays with the keys being typed and shown on my monitor. It may just be a compatibility issue. Otherwise, the mouse is nice, and the keyboard does have a nice wrist rest. Overall not bad, but also not great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this keyboard and mouse. Both are very comfortable to use for long periods of time. The mouse is very sturdy and well built. And I love being able to change the colors on both to fit my mood.
